name: Kira-kira Star Night AC
summary: Kira Kira Star Night AC is an arcade adaptation of Kira Kira Star Night DX created to promote the release of its console cousin. It plays almost exactly the same: players take on the role of Fami-chan, catching falling stars to try and achieve a high score. The gameplay in this version is slightly tweaked, with Fami-chan now having two different jump heights based on the jump button the player chooses. It had a limited release of one cabinet at the Kaden no Ken-chan store in Akihabara before later being released on CD-ROM for Windows.
